body.title: Body field
body.description: This is the main text area for this page

class.title: Body class
class.description: This is a set of CSS classes that should be applied to this entity's body field. Where these classes are applied in the markup is dependent on the theme.

path.title: Path
path.description: This is the URL path that this page will be accessible from. This includes a leading slash. The path should look something like '/mypage' or '/my/longer/path'. To make this page the front page of the site, use a path of '/'.
